alert.note: Alert for Brantley; Camden; Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 20 at 6:00PM EDT until June 20 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Camden County in southeastern Georgia... Southeastern Brantley County in southeastern Georgia... Northeastern Charlton County in southeastern Georgia... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 600 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles east of Race Pond, or 12 miles south of Nahunta, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Waverly, Winokur and Tarboro. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
